title: Kuda steal money from the people it’s a scam bank
userName: Kuda worst bank in Apple store

review:
Why are you collecting details about people’s income, employment and livelihoods, and making it mandatory? Users can’t access the app and consequently their funds unless they provide these details. That is wrong. Very wrong. It’s tantamount to holding people’s funds to ransom!

You need to explain what you’re collecting the information for, how you are using it and who has access to it. That’s the norm regarding collection of consumer sensitive data, which you are not following.

And why do I need to create a new PIN every time I log out of the account or you forcefully log me out after an update? It’s very frustrating. Why aren’t you keeping PINs, then requiring us to create a new one each time we want to log back in after being logged out?

Your app has lost its user friendliness. Completely. I now understand what the online complaints are about.
title: Mandatorily Collecting Unnecessary & Worrisome Sensitive Data

Stay safe people!

title: Urgent reply

review:
I hardly ever leave a bad review for any app, business or service. But this has to be the height of it. 

Customer service is almost non-existent, banking practice/knowledge is 0. How do you hold on to over £1000 for weeks especially when the transfer is being made to a long time beneficiary who also happens to be the person that sent the funds in the account. If I receive money from individual A and chose to send it back to the invdividual A why do you need to investigate. If we assume that it was fraudulent Why does it take forever to investigate. If it is fraud, why is it being sent back to the account it was stolen from then. 

Anyway, this is my personal experience, others will likely be different and maybe better or worse.

Henry M.
title: Absolutely horrible, avoid if you can
